title: Robotics and Edge Computing
desc: The NVIDIA Jetson™ and Isaac™ platforms provide end-to-end solutions to develop and deploy AI-powered autonomous machines and edge computing applications across manufacturing, logistics, healthcare, smart cities, and retail.

carousel.title: NVIDIA Isaac Taps Generative AI for Manufacturing and Logistics
carousel.desc: Introducing new foundation models, a robot learning framework, AI workflow orchestration and robot perception tools.

carousel.title: Scale AI-Enabled Robotics Development Workloads With NVIDIA OSMO
carousel.desc: This powerful new cloud-native compute orchestration service delivers a single pane of glass for scheduling and managing autonomous machine workloads.

carousel.title: J&J to Build AI-Powered Digital and Robotic Surgery
carousel.desc: Using NVIDIA AI and robotics to deliver real-time insights before, during, and after surgical procedures.

carousel.title: Transform Far Edge Vision AI Development
carousel.desc: NVIDIA introduces powerful microservices and APIs to bring edge AI to production faster than ever before.

carousel.title: Introducing Metropolis for Factories
carousel.desc: Learn how electronics giants tap into industrial automation with NVIDIA Metropolis for Factories.

carousel.title: The Future of Industrial-Grade Edge AI
carousel.desc: Check out the rugged, power-efficient NVIDIA Jetson AGX Orin™ Industrial system-on-module.

carousel.title: Techman Robot Selects Isaac Sim for Automated Optical Inspection
carousel.desc: The company is accelerating robotics-based inspection in automotive and electronics manufacturing.

carousel.title: Introducing Isaac AMR
carousel.desc: An integrated software stack designed for AI-enabled Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) with edge to cloud workflow.

carousel.title: NVIDIA® Jetson Orin Nano™ Developer Kit
carousel.desc: Discover a new standard for creating entry-level AI-powered robots, smart drones, and intelligent cameras.

carousel.title: Product development with advanced embedded AI systems.
carousel.desc: Create with the most powerful AI computers for energy-efficient autonomous machines.
